contentList.content: Thunderous Strike

Strike a creature with your melee weapon, causing them to take another [1] should they choose to move.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted.
Thunder Struck
Affected creature will take [1] should they choose to move.
Create or Extinguish Flames

Create a [1] flaming surface, or extinguish flames entirely from a creature, object, or surface.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Create Flames

Create a [1] flaming surface.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Extinguish Flames

Extinguish a flaming creature, object, or surface.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Create Bonfire
Create a magical bonfire which grants all within [1] of it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage.
Fireside Comfort
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage while within [1] of the nearby bonfire.
Druidcraft
Attempt to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED_VINES">Entangle</LSTag> another creature.
Frostbite
Touch a creature, causing a numbing frost to form around them, imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Frigid
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. Removed upon dealing damage.
Green Flame-Blade

Strike a creature with your melee weapon, causing a spark of flame to ricochet into another enemy within [1], dealing [2].

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted.
Gust Bellow
Create a [1] area of wind around yourself, removing surfaces and potentially forcing creatures back by [2].
Conjure Infestation
Conjure a swarm of tiny Spiders around your target, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SPIDER_INFESTATION">Infesting</LSTag> them.
Spark Surge
Expel a bolt of lightning from your fingertips at a creature, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocking</LSTag> them.
Warpstone

While not Threatened, throw a magical stone, immediately warping to wherever it lands.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Mind Sliver

Deal Psychic damage to a creature, potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIND_SLIVER">Fracturing</LSTag> their ability to think clearly, incurring a -1d4 penalty to their next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Mind Fracture
Affected creature suffers a -1d4 penalty to their next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Mud Mantle

Root yourself to the ground in magically hardened Mud, perfectly contoured to the shape of your body. A [1] area of mud is created around you upon casting.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted.
Mud Mantle

Affected creature cannot move, and is covered in magically hardened mud, perfectly countoured to the shape of their body. The creatures <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increases by 1. Additionally, the creature cannot <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag>, and they become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Fire damage.
Prestidigitation

Create a single, illusory duplicate of yourself, forcing the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> made against you to be rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Prestidigitation

Affected creature has created a single, illusory duplicate of themselves, forcing the next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> made against them to be rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Primal Savagery

Channel primal magic to cause your fingernails to sharpen, allowing you to rake your claws across a target, potentially Poisoning them.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted.
Torrent

Cause a creature to become Wet.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Spare the Dying
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Help</LSTag> an ally from a distance.
Blade Surge
Summon a [1] cyclone of blades around you.
Thunderclap
Unleash a thunderous boom, dealing damage to any nearby creatures within [1].
Toll the Dead

Channel the ringing of a dolorous bell within your palm to fill the air around a creature. If the targeted creature is below half of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, the creature will take twice as much damage.
Word of Radiance
Utter a divine word, causing radiant light to erupt in a [1] area around you, dealing double damage to Aberrations, Fey, Fiends and Undead.
Absorb Elements

Grant a creature Resistance to an element of your choice for three turns.

This Spell may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Druids

Beast Bond
Touch a non-hostile beast, compelling them to fight for you.
Beast Bond
Affected creature is compelled to fight for the caster who applied this status.
Other nearby creatures may become hostile upon casting.
Cause Terror

Instill a sense of dread in a creature, potentially Terrifying them. On a successful Saving Throw, they will instead become Frightened for one turn.

Learned By:

Fighters
Sorcerers
Warlocks

Grant yourself and all allies within [1] a +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks.

Chaotic Orb
Hurl an orb of pure, chaotic energy at a creature, forcing them to experience a sudden surge of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>.
Detect Evil and Good

Detect the presence of Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends and Undead in a [1] area, preventing them from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag> or becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Detect Evil and Good

Affected creature can detect the presence of Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends and Undead in a [1] area, preventing them from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag> or becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Detected
Affected creature cannot <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hide</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Increase the radius of detection by [1] per level.

Upcast Info:
Increase the radius of detection by [1] per level.
Dispel Magic

Sense the magical presence of other creatures in a [1] area, Muting them.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Rogues
Sorcerers
Wizards
Dispel Magic
Affected creature can sense the magical presence of others in a [1] area, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Muting</LSTag> them.
Earth Tremor

Cause a [1] tremor within the ground around you to erupt, creating Difficult Terrain and possibly knocking creatures inside the tremor Prone.

Learned By:
Druids
Rangers
Rogues
Wizards
Frost Fingers

Place your hand upon another creature, rolling an additional damage die if they are Wet.

Learned By:
Fighters
Rogues
Warlocks
Wizards
Ensnaring Trap

Place a trap upon the ground. If another creature steps on the trap, they are immediately Restrained.

Learned By:
Druids
Fighters
Rangers
Warlocks
Snare Trap
Place an additional trap per level.

Upcast Info:
Place an additional trap per level.
Tasha's Caustic Brew

Spew a [1] line of caustic acid, burning everything in your path.

Learned By:
Fighters
Rogues
Warlocks
Wizards
Unseen Servant

Summon an Invisible servant. They will be ignored by other creatures, and are capable of interacting with the environment around you.

Learned By:
Clerics
Paladins
Rogues
Wizards
Unseen Servant
Zephyr Movement

Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking Opportunity Attacks. Until this effect ends, dealing damage to another creature will cause you to swap places with your target.

Learned By:
Druids
Rangers
Rogues
Wizards
Zephyr Movement

Affected creature will not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. Until this effect ends, when this creature deals damage to another creature, they swap places with their target.
Aganazzar's Scorcher
Unleash roaring flames, emanating from you in a line.
Borrowed Knowledge

Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past to grant yourself or another allied creature Advantage on Skill Checks.

Learned By:
Clerics
Paladins
Rogues
Wizards
Borrowed Knowledge
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
Frostflame Armaments

A frigid cold envelops your main-hand melee weapon. Simultaneously, a roaring flame erupts around your off-hand melee weapon.

Upon landing a killing blow, a Frostflame explosion occurs, dealing [1] and [2] too all enemies within a [3] radius.

Learned By:
Clerics
Fighters
Paladins
Warlocks
The Frostflame explosion deals an additional [1] and [2] per level.

Upcast Info:
The Frostflame explosion deals an additional [1] and [2] per level.
Frostflame Armament (Ice)
A frigid cold envelops this weapon. Upon landing a killing blow, a frigid explosion occurs, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2].
Frostflame Armament (Fire)
A roaring flame envelops this weapon. Upon landing a killing blow, a fiery explosion occurs, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2].
Arcane Vortex

Summon a [1] raging vortex of arcane energy which deals [2] per turn to any creatures within. The vortex is considered Difficult Terrain.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Rogues
Sorcerers
Wizards
Arcane Vortex Aura
Affected creature takes [1] per turn while remaining in the arcane vortex. The vortex is considered <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Arcane Vortex
Affected creature is being dealt [1] per turn while remaining in the arcane vortex.
Healing Spirit

Call forth a feline spirit to soothe the wounded in combat. While a creature is within [1] of the spirit, it can heal them for [2] Hit Points.

Learned By:
Clerics
Druids
Paladins
Rangers
The feline spirit heals an additional [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> per level.

Upcast Info:
The feline spirit heals an additional [1] Hit Points per level.
Healing Spirit
Soothing Sounds
Soothe the wounds of a nearby creature, healing it.
Feline Bombardment

Upon landing a killing blow, call forth a feline familiar. Upon death, the familiar will erupt in a blazing inferno, dealing [1] to all creatures within [2]. At the end of each of their turns, the familiar takes [3].

Learned By:
Barbarians
Druids
Rangers
Sorcerers
Blazing Bombadier
Increase the damage of the inferno by [1] per Spell Slot.

Upcast Info:
Increase the damage of the inferno by [1] per Spell Slot.
Feline Bombardment
Affected creature will call forth a feline familiar upon landing a killing blow.
Feline Bombardment
Affected creature is taking [1] per turn. Upon death, it will erupt in a blazing inferno, scorching everything within [2] for [3].
Feline Bombardment
Erupt in a blazing inferno.
Kinetic Permeation

You and other creatures within [1] of you become Permeable, allowing them to be moved through.

This Spell may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Rogues
Sorcerers
Wizards
Increase the distance at which you apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KINETIC_JAUNT_WALKTHROUGH">Permeation</LSTag> by [1] per Spell Slot.

Upcast Info:
Increase the distance at which you apply Permeation by [1] per Spell Slot.
Kinetic Permeation
Affected creature is causing themselves and other creatures within [1] of them to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KINETIC_JAUNT_WALKTHROUGH">Permeable</LSTag>, allowing them to be moved through.
Permeable
Affected creature can be moved through.
Maximilian's Earthen Grasp

Create a hand composed of soil to crush and possibly Restrain a creature.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Druids
Rangers
Sorcerers
Maximilian's Earthen Grasp
Crush a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a different creature.
Maximillian's Earthen Grasp: Crush
Crush a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target.
Maximillian's Earthen Grasp: Change
Reach for a different creature with the earthen hand, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restraining</LSTag> it and freeing the previous target.
Mind Spike

Speak a spike of psychic pain into the mind of another creature, lowering their Intelligence by 1. This effect can stack. Upon reaching 0 Intelligence, your target will die. While Concentrating, you may drive further Mind Spikes into your target without expending a Spell Slot.

Learned By:
Fighters
Rogues
Warlocks
Wizards
Mind Spike
Affected creature has had their <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> reduced by 1 per remaining stack of Mind Spike. Upon reaching 0 Intelligence, your target will die.
Drive Mind Spike
Drive the Mind Spike deeper into your targets psyche, further reducing their <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> by 1. Upon reaching 0 Intelligence, your target will die.
Nathair's Mischief

Afflict a creature with chaotic magic, causing them to experience a sudden surge of Wild Magic at the start of their turns. Wild Magic caused by this Spell is truly random, and can be both positive or negative.

Learned By:
Fighters
Rogues
Warlocks
Wizards
Nathair's Mischief
Affected creature will experience a sudden surge of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag> at the start of their turn.
Rime's Binding Ice

Unleash a burst of cold energy across [1], hindering creatures with ice formations that reduce their Movement Speed by half.

This Spell may be cast while Silenced or Muted.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Fighters
Sorcerers
Warlocks
Rime's Binding Ice
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> has been reduced by half.
Snilloc's Snow Storm

Summon a [1] burst of frigid cold in the area around you, applying three stacks of Frostbite if your targets are Wet.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Druids
Rangers
Sorcerers
Tasha's Mind Whip
Aggressively pull at a fragment of another creatures mind, preventing them from taking <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Pull at an additional fragment per level. The same target may be selected multiple times.
Tasha's Mind Whip
Affected creature cannot use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Transposition

Forcibly teleport another creature to an area you can see. Dangerous and Fatal foes cannot be transposed.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Clerics
Paladins
Sorcerers
Transposition
Affected creature can be teleported at any time by the caster who applied this status.
Warding Winds

Conjure a fierce wind which blows around you in a [1] radius, clearing clouds and extinguishing flames on one's person. To all other creatures, this wind is considered Difficult Terrain.

Ranged attacks made against creatures or objects within the wind are rolled with Disadvantage.

Learned By:
Druids
Rangers
Rogues
Wizards
Warding Winds

Affected creature is centered within a fierce wind which clears clouds and extinguishes flames on one's person. To all other creatures, this wind is considered Difficult Terrain.

Ranged attacks made against creatures or objects within the wind are rolled with Disadvantage.
Warding Winds

Affected creature is whipped by a fierce wind which clears clouds and extinguishes flames on one's person. Ranged attacks made against creatures or objects within the wind are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Wither and Bloom

Invoke both life and death in a [1] area, damaging enemies and healing allies for [2] Hit Points.

Learned By:
Clerics
Druids
Paladins
Rangers
Damage enemies for an additional [1] and heal allies for an additional [2] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> per level.

Upcast Info:
Damage enemies for an additional [1] and heal allies for an additional [2] Hit Points per level.
Psionic Antagonism

Evoke a sense of antagonism within a [1] group of creatures, preventing them from using Reactions.

Learned By:
Fighters
Rogues
Warlocks
Wizards
Psionic Antagonism
Affected creature cannot use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Ashardalon's Stride

Billowing dragon flames erupt from your feet in a [1] radius, granting explosive speed that allows you to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DASH">Dash</LSTag> without provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Catnap

Make a calming gesture that forces allies within [1] of you to fall asleep. Upon waking, they will have recovered their class based resources.

Once affected by this Spell, a creature cannot benefit from it again until it finishes a Long Rest.

This Spell may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Druids
Rangers
Sorcerers
Catnap
Affected creature has recovered their class based resources due to a quick nap.
Enemies Abound
Whisper a hex unto a creature, filling them with bouts of paranoia and forcing them to see nearby friends as foes.
Enemies Abound
Affected creature is viewing nearby friends as foes.
Erupting Earth

Tear the ground asunder, creating a [1] shockwave that damages anything caught in the area.

This Spell may be cast while Silenced or Muted.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Druids
Rangers
Sorcerers
Flame Arrows

Conjure [1] flaming arrows. Attacks with flaming arrows deal an additional [2]. When targeting a creature or object with a Ranged Weapon Attack, one arrow will be consumed.

Once affected by this Spell, a creature cannot cast it again until it finishes a Long Rest. Your arrows are restored upon taking a Short Rest.

Learned By:
Druids
Fighters
Rangers
Warlocks
Gain an additional 6 arrows per level.

Upcast Info:
Gain an additional 6 arrows per level.
Flame Arrows
Affected creature is wielding flaming arrows. These arrows deal an additional [1] and cause targets to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> for three turns.
Flame Arrows
The amount of Flame Arrows you have remaining. <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> targeting a creature or object will consume one Flame Arrow.
Flame Arrows

While active, your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> will fire flaming arrows that deal an additional [1] and cause your targets to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> for three turns. This can be toggled at any time.
Internal Fortress

Reduce all damage a creature takes by an amount equal to their Proficiency Bonus.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Rogues
Sorcerers
Wizards
Internal Fortress
Affected creature takes less damage from all sources by an amount equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Blood Broker

Sacrifice your own life in order to resurrect a companion with all of their Hit Points.

Learned By:
Clerics
Fighters
Paladins
Warlocks
Barrier of Holding

Summon a [1] magical barrier, keeping everything within grounded and unable to move. At the beginning of each of their turns, all held creatures will attempt a Strength based Saving Throw to try and escape.

Upon a successful Saving Throw, a creature becomes immune to the effects of the barrier until the end of their turn.

Learned By:
Clerics
Paladins
Rogues
Wizards
Barrier of Holding
Everything within the Barrier of Holding is potentially grounded and unable to move.
Barrier Bound

Affected creature is grounded and unable to move. At the beginning of each of their turns, they will attempt a Strength based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> to try and escape. Upon a successful Saving Throw, they will become immune to the effects of the barrier for one turn.
Barrier Immunity
Affected creature is immune to the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BarrierOfHolding">Barrier of Holding</LSTag> for the rest of their turn.
Melf's Minute Meteors

Summon a cluster of [1] meteors that can be sent hurling toward an area to explode, dealing damage in a [2] area.

Once affected by this Spell, a creature cannot cast it again until it finishes a Long Rest. Your meteors are restored upon taking a Short Rest.

Learned By:
Barbarians
Rogues
Sorcerers
Wizards
Melf's Minute Meteors
Affected creature can magically summon a cluster of up to [1] meteors that can be sent hurling toward an area to explode.
Hurl Minute Meteors
Hurl an explosive meteor, dealing damage in a [1] area.
Minute Meteors
The amount of Minute Meteors you have remaining.
Create four additional meteors per level.

Upcast Info:
Create four additional meteors per level.
Motivational Speech

Grant another creature in the area <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If hit by an attack, the affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Motivational Speech
